title: Lacquered Chinese Bacon Recipe
full_text:
Lacquered Chinese Bacon Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
20 mins
Active
10 mins
Soaking Time
6 hrs
Total
6 hrs 25 mins
Makes
30 pieces of lacquered bacon
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
pound
of
Chinese bacon
, soaked in water for at least 6 hours
1 1/2
cups
brown sugar
Directions
Preheat oven to 425
°
F (220°C). Cut meat crosswise into 1/4-inch-thick pieces.
Place sugar in a wide dish and dredge both sides of each bacon piece in sugar, pressing sugar firmly onto pieces with your fingers.
Arrange slices on a pan or skillet and bake, turning once, until bacon is cooked and browned, about 15 to 20 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature.
Bacon
